runs.comm: full delivery, outside off stump, Smith pushes it, bat away from his body, towards mid-off.
good delivery, full and on the middle and off, hint of late movement away, Smith was trying to work it towards the on side and gets a leading edge through cover point
slips down leg side, Smith was on the shuffle and failed to connect with the glance and it just shaved past the leg stump. Oohs and aahs from Zak and Dhoni
short of length and outside off stump, cut away to point
length delivery on the middle and off, defended down the track.
And Smith cashes in on the width. Two balls ago, he failed to put away, cutting straight to point but not this time. He cut it hard and past point for the first boundary
closer to the off stump and carefully defended down the track

high full toss on the off stump, pushed towards point and ROhit Sharma misses the run out chance. He missed the stumps at the striker's end and sMith was nowhere in picture. Smith is not happy with the call and shrugs at Gibbs
full in length outside off stump, dabbed to third man

lovely cover drive. Great to watch. This man can make batting look really easy, as they say. It was full and in the slot all right but Gibbs stayed still, remained adjacent to the line and caressed it through extra cover.

ah! the commentator's curse. He gets a fatal inside edge. It was a heavily packed off-side as Dhoni had moved an extra fielder after the previous four and Gibbs went for the leg side. Mistake. It wasn't all that short and it was outside off stump, Gibbs went for the pull and dragged it back to his stumps.
beaten on the drive. RP angled it outside off and Ab ended up chasing it

What a feisty cut. It was slightly short and not all that wide from the off stump but Ab bent his knees to hold his balance and unfurled the horizontal shot to perfection. The ball raced to the backward point boundary
And Smith pings the cover boundary. Half-volley outside off and the burly South Africa captain shuffled a bit before he drove it through the gap.
cutting in towards off and middle but the angle coming in is enough for Smith to favour his favourite on side. He clips it past square leg
length delivery on the off stump and Smith respects it by defending it on the front foot. "That's a better delivery by Zaheer," says Anil Kumble on air.
length delivery tailing in late and Smith inside-edges it to backward square leg region for a quick single
full in length, moving away from AB who guides it to third man
Yuvraj mis-fields at mid-on. It was driven to him and Smith put pressure on him by starting for the single and Yuvraj succumbed to the pressure. He didn't pick it cleanly and the ball ran past him
length delivery around the off stump, no slip in place and AB partly steers it, partly edges it through vacant slip region. Perhaps, more deliberate than edged.
on and around the off stump, full in length, steered to backward point region.
Slap! Short and wide and AB doesn't miss out on those. He was on the front foot but shifted his weight at the last minute to crack it past point. Fine-leg moves up now. deep point in place.
shuffles towards off to tap the length delivery to backward point
short in length, gets the bottom edge on the cut but will pick up a single to third man
short in length, outside off, cut away to wide third man region
starts off with a fullish delivery around off stump, pushed out to mid-off, they think about the single but decide against it
Top shot. What a delicious classy straight drive. It was full, it was straight and AB leaned fully into it and caressed it past the stumps at the other end.
just outside the off stump, perhaps tempted by the vacant slip region, AB tried to dab it to third man but doesn't connect
slower one, full, turned past square leg
hurls across a yorker, Smith takes out the front leg from the line in a hurry and digs it out to the off side
135 kmph full length delivery around the off stump, mistimes the cover drive
floated outside off stump, driven to RP Singh at mid-off
moves outside leg stump, Jadeja follows him and Smith drags it to deep midwicket
goes for the big slog sweep, misses but the ball bounces just over the middle stump. Jadeja jumps in agony. Touch and go there.
more circumspect this time as he nudges it to the on side for a single
backs away but can't get much power behind that forcing shot and it rolls to cover
stays back to turn it past square leg for a single. Tight over.
yorker length on the middle, pushed to Raina at extra cover
leans forward to drive to long-off
slows up the pace, flighted across, AB plays a lovely chip shot over to deep midwicket, almost ala that stylist Carl Hooper.
steps out to drive to long-on
Smith gets forward to drive down to long-off
comes down the track, Rohit drags back the length and AB works it past midwicket
slightly short outside off, cut away to Ishant at sweeper cover
from round the stumps now, Smith stays back to push it to midwicket
comes down the track, Yuvraj slows up the pace and shortens the length, Smith lunges out in the end and edges it to short fine-leg
quicker, outside off, cut away to Raina at extra cover
leans forward to turn it past midwicket
goes right back to tap it past square leg
flighted full, on driven past midwicket
goes for the sweep and will pick a single down to long leg

Harbhajan has lured Smith to his demise. Smith was charging out, Harbhajan slowed up the pace, retained the flight but got it to dip rapidly on Smith who lunged out in the end, trying to drag it to the on side and top-edging it high to midwicket. Harbhajan pumps his fist.
lovely off break, flighted and turning in sharply on this spin-track and it goes past the drive and strikes the pad outside the off stump
again, turns in big from outside off and AB is struck on the pad
stays back to carefully nudge this off break to the off side
flighted full on the middle, turned towards midwicket for a quick single but Raina doesn't pick it cleanly
on the middle and off, skidding in,. punched to sweeper cover
turns in from outside off, tapped to point
leans forward to drive to right of cover where Raina makes a fine sliding stop. ALmost ala Azhar who would let the ball almost go past him as he would dive and get it back from his behind.
driven through the on side to wide long-on for couple of runs
around the off stump, turning but AB does well to drive it towards Yusuf at long-off
swept away to deep backward square leg for couple of runs
turning in from outside off, dabbed to short third man

almost caught at slip. It drifted towards leg stump, from round the stumps,. dipped before turning sharply, the batsman was trying to tap it to the on side and edges it well to the left of the diving slip.
around the off stump, spinning away, stabbed to the left of slip again.
goes back to work it to square leg
flighted full delivery around the off and middle, Duminy is struck on the pad, trying to defend
slightly short of length, cut away to point.
leans forward to push to the off side
turns from outside leg stump, pretty dry and spinning wicket this, defended to the on side
allows it to spin past him before he plays a deft late cut past short third man.
goes right back to defend but the ball turns and bounces and catches the edge and the ball lobs to short-leg region
on the middle and leg, Duminy pushes outside the line and is struck on the pad
turns towards leg stump, nudged to the on side
from round the stumps, around the off stump, Duminy goes back to tap it to backward point
slows up the pace, tosses it outside off stump, swept to deep square leg where Yusuf fields but can't prevent the second run. Harbhajan is not too happy
goes down the track, almost yorks himself as he digs it out to midwicket
quicker, around the off stump, nudged towards point where Yuvraj rushes forward and hurls the thorw to Harbhajan
And again, pushed towards Yuvraj
comes n with the arm, AB picks it to whip it towards deep midwicket
outside off stump, full, not the length to go for the cut but AB tries and misses
And now he plays a classy inside-out lofted shot. It was tossed full outside off and AB goes down on his knees to lift it over extra-cover.
And he goes against the turn now. It was floated full and AB slog sweeps it to wide long-on boundary. Superbly struck. 50 up for AB. What a fine player.
worked to deep midwicket for a single
on the middle, turned past midwicket, past Raina .. "Bhag Bhag Raina (Run run Raina) says Dhoni but the ball rushes past Raina and the deep midwicket fielder rushes in to pick it
from round the stumps, floated outside off stump, lifted towards Ishant at deep cover
flighted full and AB leans forward to pick his gap at wide midwicket boundary and lifted it towards his destination. Cleanly struck and effortlessly played.
runs down the track and drives to long-off

Stumped! Duminy, who never looked in on this spin track, was beaten in the flight as he lunged forward before he was beaten by the turn. Dhoni did the rest. Seeing Duminy struggle, you just have to nod in admiration at how well AB has played on this spin track.
flighted around the middle stump, turned to midwicket
slows up the pace, turns it from outside off, dabbed to the off side
gets forward to drive to extra cover
quicker arm ball on the middle, punched to long-off
quick arm-ball again, on the off stump, defended to cover
lunges forward to defend down the track
fullish, outside off, square driven but can't beat point
quick again, drifting towards leg stump, Boucher can't connect with the flick and it rolls off the pad
runs down the track, doesn't quite reach to the pitch but adjusts to drive with the turn to long-off
skips down the track and chips it towards long-on for a single
low full toss on the middle and leg, swung to right of Ishant at deep midwicket
low dipping full quick delivery, punched to deep midwicket
slows up the pace, Bouch is early into the sweep shot and is struck on the body
It might be a spin track but it's not going to turn if you are going to bowl a full toss. Boucher slapped it hard and to the right of Ishant at deep midwicket.
What a fine shot again by AB. He stays on the leg stump line and drives with the turn and lofts it to left of RP at long-off

AB falls after a very fine knock on a sharply turning track. He rushed down the track, didn't reach the pitch and tried to adjust with a big slog sweep but the ball turned to get the leading edge. Jadeja back-pedaled to get under the ball.
on the leg stump line, turned towards deep midwicket
leans forward to push it to the off side of the pitch
pushed towards extra cover for a quick single. Yusuf fires in a direct hit at the non-striker's end but he is home.
full and outside off stump, driven to deep cover
from round the stumps, slow through the air, BOucher moves to the leg side and pushes it through cover point
the quick arm-ball just outside off stump and past the attempted late cut and Dhoni doesn't collect cleanly
slips towards pads, clipped past square leg
BOucher charges down the track and Harbhajan slows the pace, shortens the length and gets the doosra to bounce and Bouch mistimes the intended lofted shot in the air but short of midwicket
cut away to Jadeja at backward point and he fires in a throw to Harbhajan who doesn't gather cleanly. It would have been touch and go.
quick delivery searching for the blockhole, falls short and Boucher swings it to wide long-on region
full in length, tilting in towards the pad and it rolls away to point for a leg bye
Caught at the long-off boundary. It was full, it was the slower one,  and it was around the off stump, Bouch flayed it hard and high to left of RP who holds a good catch running around the boundary.
cutting towards the on side, Albie goes for the pull, gets cramped up but gloves it to the fine-leg boundary
goes for the yorker, ends up as a swinging full toss, and runs off the pad to short-fine-leg

tries the slower yorker, just short of the blockhole and Botha drills it to right of long-off where RP makes a fine diving stop. Hold on, he has brushed the ropes while still in contact with the ball. And that's four.
the yorker outside off stump, BOtha attempts to paddle but misses and gets a leg bye.
